name: Brush (Chen Rui)
description:
This is a simple game requiring two players to control the characters on the screen. Players can control by keyboard with Space or X to create bullets, WASD and Arrow to move. Bullets can brush the floor to divided colors, or attack the other player. Every player can get up to three bullets.

This is a game participating Global Game Jam 2022. Rui is responsible for programming and Xinyu is responsible for 2D arts. We designed the 2D game together.
